title: The Stone of Fate
description: *** Revised***A fate is written for us all, hidden away, waiting for the right moment to present itself. However, for Cara and Kirsta, fate it seems has a way to knock things off balance. When joined by the mystical powers of the Stone of Destiny, they will embark on a journey that will test their strength, their loyalty, and the bonds of friendship. Together they must learn the meaning of their design fate in order to stop a common enemy that threatens to destroy the realms of man and god.The Stone of Fate is the first book in the Gray Storm trilogy.Inspired by Celtic folktales, Gray Storm challenges the fate of the gods by proving even the purest of heart can be tempted to fall.Show moreShow less
author: Jennifer Lefort
